title: Identifying initial transformation products during chlorination of the indole moiety and unveiling their formation mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00196F, Paper
MengXue Huan, Yong Dong Liu, Rugang Zhong
Initial transformation products and their formation mechanisms in the chlorination of the indole moiety in tryptophan (Trp) are investigated using a quantum chemical computational method.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
